title: Website Traffic Generator Options
description: This is actor input schemaSpecify the options to generate traffic on urls of your choice.

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: URLs to begin the crawler with

multiply.title: Loops
multiply.description: How many times should we generate pageviews for the same page?

maxPages.title: Maximum Number of Pages to Crawl
maxPages.description: Limit the number of pages to prevent crawler for running too long. (Default: 50)

enqueueLinks.title: Find new links
enqueueLinks.description: If the page has links, should we also crawl them?

parallelize.title: Run in Parallel
parallelize.description: Should we open pages in parallel?

maxPageWaitSeconds.title: Max Wait
maxPageWaitSeconds.description: Maximum seconds to wait after loading the page (Default: 5)
maxPageWaitSeconds.sectionDescription: Specify how long should the crawler wait after loading the page. We will randomise the wait time between the min and max seconds to make it a more natural page wait.

minPageWaitSeconds.title: Min Wait
minPageWaitSeconds.description: Minimum seconds to wait after loading the page (Default: 1)

proxy.title: Choose Proxies
proxy.description: Select proxies to be used by your crawler
proxy.sectionDescription: If you'd like the traffic to come from a specific region, please add proxies, otherwise choose None.
